price: Inni gabroota Isaa irratti mo’ataadha. Inni ogeessa, keessa beekaadha.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلۡقَاهِرُ فَوۡقَ عِبَادِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa al-qāhiru fawqa ʿibādihi wahuwa al-ḥakīmu al-khabīru
